by_date_created.map:
function(doc) 
{ 
	emit
	( 
		doc.date_created,
		{
			type:'pmss',
			host_state:doc.host_state,
			pmss_state_code:doc.tracking.pmss_state_code,
			track_year:doc.tracking.track_year,
			pmssno:doc.tracking.pmssno,
			med_coder_check: doc.tracking.med_coder_check,
			med_dir_check:doc.tracking.med_dir_check,
			death_certificate_number:doc.tracking.death_certificate_number,
			status:doc.tracking.status,
			dod:doc.tracking.dod,
			month_of_death:doc.tracking.date_of_death.month,
			day_of_death:doc.tracking.date_of_death.day,
			year_of_death:doc.tracking.date_of_death.year,
			dob:doc.demographics.dob,
			month_of_birth:doc.demographics.date_of_birth.month,
			day_of_birth:doc.demographics.date_of_birth.day,
			year_of_birth:doc.demographics.date_of_birth.year,
			agreement_status:doc.committee_review.agreement_status,
			version: doc.version,
			residence_zip: doc.tracking.residence_zip,
			date_created: doc.date_created,
			created_by: doc.created_by,
			date_last_updated: doc.date_last_updated,
			last_updated_by: doc.last_updated_by,
			date_last_checked_out: doc.date_last_checked_out,
			last_checked_out_by: doc.last_checked_out_by
		}
	);
	
}
